title: Tribe Organic
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, International, Organic, Western, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Organic food restaurant at 北京市朝阳区工体东路中国红街大厦3号楼1层入口处南侧. Offers western and international cuisine with salads, wraps, sandwiches, noodles, grain bowls, soup, plus beverages including juices and smoothies. Has vegan dessert. Opened summer 2014.
streetAddress: Ground floor, building 3, China View Plaza, Worker's Stadium East Road
